quote: All you need is passion. If you have a passion for something, you'll create the talent. – Yanni
fact: The 57 on Heinz ketchup bottles represents the number of varieties of pickles the company once had.
joke: What do Alexander the Great and Winnie the Pooh have in common? Same middle name.
